Counter Strike: Source is wonderful. In a lot of ways, I find it better than GO.
The first time I played this, it was 2007-2008 and I played for a solid 3 years straight. Unfortunately, that was on an older account that I can't log in to anymore. I put so many hours in and met so many awesome people that I will likely never meet again - it's depressing to think about.

Luckily there are still so many active servers (some of which are servers i played on 10+ years ago!!) that are usually filled with people so I at least can get the nostalgia factor. 
If you have not yet, play the game now while it's still relatively alive.
Unos de mi juego favoritos de todos los tiempos una joya (OLD BUT GOLD)
Counter-Strike: Source Blends Counter-Strike's Award-Winning Teamplay Action With The Advanced Technology of Source™ Technology... Much Love CS:S <3

Отличная игра с хорошим онлайном, на серверах этой замечательной игры вас будут приветствовать отличные и самое главное доброжелательные люди. Так же ваши уши будет ласкать отличная музыка на пабликах. Желаю хороших выстрелов ПРЯМО В ЖБААН и СВЕЖИХ КАБАНЧИКОВ! 20/10
Игра хорошая и интересная все реклмендую её преобрести и поиграть🥳👌🏻
Отличная игра ! Моя первая практика в кс )

The name of this game should not be Counter Strike. It should be Camper/Cheating Strike. I play CS almost everyday at least 2-3 hours. Normally you should get better, but here there is no chance in hell. Even if you play that game 6 hours every day, for six months, you can't beat most of the player here. And by the way it is so unreal. The reason why I still play that game is: If I find better games here and I bet I will I won't play that game anymore. Time & money waste!!!!!
Love the gun games, nothing better to soothe the nerves than to aim and shoot non-stop
Has a way better and way established modding community than CSGO imo. It’s a dying game but there’s a couple good servers and game mode still to this day. Still recommend to screw around.
